nitf_Extensions Struct Reference

#include <Extensions.h>

Detailed Description

Object containing listing of TREs discovered in segment.

The Extensions object represents the user defined and extended header portions of the various segments. The representation internally is cross-indexed -- once as an associative array, to yield fast lookups and once as a linked list to maintain TRE ordering. The hash table points at a list of TREs matching the key (which is the TRE name). The list is of references to the TREs containing the TRE and some context information.
